Quick search

User documentation¶

This part will focus on the usage of the ACN simulator. To use the simulator one must specify a scheduling algorithm and a test case the scheduling algorithm will run over. There are already some pre-written scheduling algorithms to use in the simulation and these will also serve as good examples and guidelines when writing scheduling algorithms.

Contents:

  • Getting started
    • Download
    • Importing libraries
    • Creating a Test Case
    • Define scheduling algorithm
    • Run simulation
    • Analyze simulation result
  • Writing an scheduling algorithm
  • API Reference
